posts.postText:
Your In-Game name: David Tennant
Your Steam ID:STEAM_0:0:15869913

Reason: I was blatantly trolling.
Length of Ban/Date and Time of Unban: PERMA
What server were you playing?: On the TTT server
Who banned you?: Funnyraff
Why should we unban you?: I've been on this community for a long time and I just goof around sometimes, I just have fun on it and love the players there, its the best ttt server on gmod and I just can't stand not being able to go on it, I admit that I was trolling and that I always used to troll on nnjg but I just thought it was funny with the amy pond stuff and the tranny things, I didn't see the harm in it. I took the chance that I had to play on the server for granted without really realizing the harm I was causing, this is my last unban request to nnjg before you decide if I am unbanned or not remember that I just was joking around and that I will never troll again, IF I am unbanned I assure you that this will be the last time you will see the name David Tennant before Unban request on this forum. 


 I really hope  you unban me, Thank you.

Well, to be honest, I think your apology is very sincere, and I would shorten your ban from permanent to, something more subtle.


Ban shortened, locked.

 EDIT: (Basically, you have to wait a week)
